text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Hishi Amazon attends a pre-race<n>interview where
she states her intention<n>to beat stronger
opponents, and reach<n>greater heights.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
The audience is thrilled by her<n>declaration, and
she takes on the<n>challenge while shouldering
everyone's<n>expectations.
